attributes.action: Stop the triggering of Article 50  in the interests of UK integrity and safety
attributes.background: Triggering Article 50 to leave the EU on the basis of an advisory referendum called for party political purposes, and undemocratically conducted, is profoundly against the values and interests of the UK, and an immediate threat to the UK's political integrity and the safety of its citizens.

rejection.details:
The Prime Minister has already written to European Council President Donald Tusk to notify him of the UK’s intention to leave the EU, so it is not possible for the Government to take this action.

You can read the full text of the letter here:

https://www.planforbritain.gov.uk/news/prime-ministers-letter-donald-tusk-triggering-article-50/?_ga=1.26312509.1235604037.1436001364
